product.name: Coca-Cola Classic Coke Bottle 4L Mini Fridge w/ 12V DC and 110V AC Cords, 6 Can Portable Cooler, Personal Travel Refrigerator for Snacks Lunch Drinks Cosmetics, Desk Home Office Dorm, Red
product.description:
First introduced over 100 years ago, the glass Coke bottle has become synonymous with the brand and a favorite amongst collectors. With eye-catching artwork, a vibrant red finish, and a traditional chrome handle, this piece is a must-have for fans and collectors.
This personal-sized travel fridge has a 4.2 quart (4 liter) capacity with a removable shelf for easy organization of your contents
Eye-catching 4L cooler features the classic glass Coke  bottle, introduced over 100 years ago, against a vibrant red backdrop.
Advanced thermoelectric technology effectively cools to 32°F (18°C) below the surrounding temperature with no need for ice.
Includes both 12V DC and AC power cords for use at home, dorm, or office or on the go in your car, truck, boat, trailer, or RV.
Eye-catching chrome accents and retro refrigerator shape make this mini fridge the ultimate office, bedroom, or dorm accessory.
A secure self-locking door helps prevent temperature loss and keeps this portable car fridge from accidentally opening during transport.
The space-saving inset handhold on top makes this compact portable cooler easy to carry while still able to fit neatly on your shelf or desk.
Safely transport and store your favorite snacks, beverages, and much more in this versatile portable cooler/warmer.
product.bullet_points:
• VINTAGE COCA-COLA STYLE This portable cooler features iconic Coke bottle artwork, making it the perfect keystone piece for any Coke collector looking for style on-the-go. Whether you’re enjoying a picnic or a day at the beach, this mini fridge for bedroom adds a touch of nostalgia and charm wherever you take it.
• COMPACT AND CONVENIENT Designed as a personal mini fridge, this compact unit boasts a rounded retro refrigerator silhouette that holds six standard cans. Its small size makes it easy to fit on a desk or shelf, providing a stylish and functional cooler that’s perfect for any space in your home or office.
• 12V DC/110V AC CAPABLE This versatile portable cooler comes with an inset handhold on top, making it ideal for your home, dorm, or office. It’s perfect for on-the-go use in your truck, boat, trailer, or RV. Whether you need a small refrigerator for beverages or snacks, this mini fridge ensures you’re always prepared.
• SAFE STORAGE Conveniently and safely store a variety of items, including beverages, yogurt, fruit, juice, cheese, breast milk, cosmetics, medication, and baby bottles. This mini fridge for bedroom or travel keeps your essentials organized and easily accessible, whether at home or on the move.
• ECO-FRIENDLY COOLING AND WARMING Utilizing CFC-free thermoelectric technology, this cooler effectively keeps items chilled to 32°F (18°C) below room temperature. It also features a warming mode that can chill or heat items up to 135°F (57°C), making it an eco-friendly small refrigerator solution for all your cooling and warming needs.
